channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- Intel(R) PCM software
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- Intel(R) PCM software

item.title: CVE-2023-34351|2024-02-14T13:38:03.859Z -- n%2Fa -- intel%28r%29%20pcm%20software
item.description: Buffer underflow in some Intel(R) PCM software before version 202307 may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially enable denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-21818|2024-06-06T13:59:59.448Z -- n%2Fa -- intel%28r%29%20pcm%20software
item.description: Uncontrolled search path in some Intel(R) PCM software before version 202311 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.
